Key Match Events: Jan Vertonghen's own goal decided the match with France taking the lead in the 85th minute
France had 19 shots but only one on target
Belgium had chances with Lukaku and De Bruyne close to scoring
Post-Match Reflections: Roy Keane commented that France were the better team but lacked quality
Belgium's exit is tough on them and Kevin De Bruyne's performance was marginalised by tactics
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was described as the worst in the tournament outside of England's matches
The match was played at the Merkur Spiel-Arena in Dusseldorf
